plot: Hollywood legend Kirk Douglas shares stories about his life, his family, his work, and his philosophy after living 92 years.
title: Kirk Douglas: Before I Forget
plot_es: Hollywood legend Kirk Douglas shares stories about his life, his family, his work, and his philosophy after living 92 years.
plot_en: Hollywood legend Kirk Douglas shares stories about his life, his family, his work, and his philosophy after living 92 years.
